Package com.example.ghostkitchen.controller

Class CartController

java.lang.Object
com.example.ghostkitchen.controller.CartController
@RequestMapping("/users/")
@RestController
public class CartController
extends java.lang.Object
All the endpoints for the Cart implementation.

sherzodnimatullo

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • addItemToCart

      @PostMapping("/cart/add/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addItemToCart​(@CurrentUser UserPrincipal principal, @PathVariable java.lang.Long id)
      This method adds a menu item to the current user's cart. The method receives a item id that is used to fetch an instance of the MenuItem object from the database. We check if this item is already in the user's cart and if so, we increment the quantity of that item. If there is no item already, a CartItem is created and added to the user's cart.
      Parameters:
      principal - User credentials such as id for the current logged in user.
      id - ID of the menu item.
      Returns:
      A 200 status code with a successful API call.

    • getCard

      @GetMapping("/cart") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getCard​(@CurrentUser UserPrincipal currentUser)
      This method provides the current user's cart.
      Parameters:
      currentUser - User credentials such as id for the current logged in user.
      Returns:
      A 200 status code with the instance of user's cart.

    • removeItemFromCart

      @PutMapping("/cart/remove/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> removeItemFromCart​(@CurrentUser UserPrincipal principal, @PathVariable java.lang.Long id)
      This method removes an item from the user's cart. Using the cart item id, we fetch the instance of that cart item. Using this instance, we pass the CartItem to the removeItem method of the Cart class.
      Parameters:
      principal - User credentials such as id for the current logged in user.
      id - ID of the cart item.
      Returns:
      A 200 status code with a successful API call.

    • emptyCart

      @GetMapping("/cart/empty") public boolean emptyCart​(@CurrentUser UserPrincipal principal)
